clinical_study.brief_title: The Technique of Skin Stretching for Acute Burn Treatment and Scar Reconstruction
clinical_study.official_title: The Technique of Skin Stretching for Acute Burn Treatment and Scar Reconstruction: Clinical Applications and Working Mechanisms.

primary_outcome.measure: the surface area of the scar after 12 months

secondary_outcome.measure: scar evaluation protocol: - patient and observer scar assessment scale (POSAS); - scar elasticity (Cutometer); - scar vascularization & pigmentation (DermaSpectrometer); - scar thickness

arm_group.description: Acute Burn Wounds: Wound debridement and split skin grafting
Acute Burn Wounds: excision of the burn wound and primary closure, using a skin stretching device
Scar reconstruction: primary closure, using skin stretching device

intervention.description: After wound bed preparation the skin defect is covered with a skin transplant (split skin graft)
after woundbed preparation the wound is primarily closed by aid of the skin stretching device
as much scar as possible is excised, whereafter the wound is closed
after the scar is excised, the wound is primarily closed by aid of the skin stretching device
